Thank you for your interest in contacting me. Please let me know how I can help you. 

The most reasons to contact me are:

- Invite me to be speaker to an event
- Invite me to participate or moderate a panel
- Ask for my help reviewing a book, article or paper
- Ask for my help with an open source project
- Give me general feedback on my blog or talks

Please let me know what you need in the "message" field, and I'll get back to you.
